name: TBro
body:
### Welcome to TBro the Transcriptome Browser.
TBro is a tool to analyze transcriptomic data.

```
$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/TBroTeam/TBro
```

### Getting Started
See the tutorial on [Read the Docs](http://tbro-tutorial.readthedocs.org/en/latest/).

### Authors and Contributors
TBro was originally developed by Lenz Weber (@phryneas), Markus Ankenbrand (@iimog), Frank FÃ¶ster (@greatfireball) and Felix Bemm (@fbemm).

### Support or Contact
Open an issue on GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
